spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is remarkably accurate. Door swings for the Pantry and Master Suite entrance are slightly misinterpreted. Window glazing on the Living room exterior wall is simplified compared to the multi-pane configuration in the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms (Theatre, Activity, Alfresco, Laundry, etc.) are present and in correct adjacency. The garage is rendered as an open pad/half-wall rather than a fully enclosed structure as indicated by the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly concordant with the reference plan, including the island bench, modular sofas, and the specific L-shaped desk in the Study.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent orthographic-style projection with clean geometry. Lighting is soft and professional. Slight clipping found where the car model intersects with the garage door rail area.

detected_errors.description: Garage rendered without full enclosure/roofing structure contrary to defined wall lines.
Pantry door swing orientation is incorrect relative to the kitchen island.
Minor geometry clipping where car model overlaps the side of the garage entry.
